Package com.lpvs.service

package com.lpvs.service
This package contains services responsible for various business logic and functionality within the LPVS application. The services cover a range of tasks, including handling user authentication, processing GitHub webhooks, managing queues, performing license scans, and generating statistics.

The services in this package are structured to handle different aspects of the application's functionality, promoting modularity, maintainability, and separation of concerns.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.lpvs
    Provides the main classes and components for the License Pre-Validation Service (LPVS) application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LPVSDetectService
    Service class for detecting licenses in GitHub pull requests using a specified scanner.
    LPVSGitHubConnectionService
    Service class for managing connections to the GitHub API.
    LPVSGitHubService
    Service class for interacting with GitHub repositories and managing license-related actions.
    LPVSLicenseService
    Service class for managing licenses and license conflicts.
    LPVSLicenseService.Conflict<License1,License2>
    Represents a license conflict between two licenses.
    LPVSLoginCheckService
    Service class for handling login-related operations in LPVS.
    LPVSQueueProcessorService
    Service responsible for processing LPVSQueue elements.
    LPVSQueueService
    Service for managing LPVSQueue elements and processing webhooks.
    LPVSStatisticsService
    Service for managing statistics related to LPVSPullRequest entities.
    OAuthService
    Service for handling OAuth2 user information.
